FizzDoc is a library written in Scala to pass the FizzBuzz test.

FizzDoc is currently an experimental project under active development. Feedback and contributions are welcomed as we look to improve the project.

Getting Started

FizzDoc is currently available for Scala 2.10 and 2.11.

To get started with SBT, simply add the following to your build.sbt file:

libraryDependencies += "org.fizzdoc" %% "fizzdoc" % "0.4.1"

Last updated on March 20, 2016
